attributes.action: make an URGENT PUBLIC STATEMENT on how it is possible for him, as the guardian of democracy in this country, to allow so many people into the chamber of the House of Commons who have appalling judgement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the last week or so I have heard it repeatedly stated by elected politicians that they have made serious errors of judgement over their allowances claims.  How can anybody who cannot be relied upon to use proper judgement in all that they do in connection with their role as MPs be allowed to continue in a role with so much responsibility.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
